screen: % scons -Q OS=linux Install file: "build/linux/world/world.h" as "export/linux/include/world.h" cc -o build/linux/hello/hello.o -c -Iexport/linux/include build/linux/hello/hello.c cc -o build/linux/world/world.o -c -Iexport/linux/include build/linux/world/world.c ar rc build/linux/world/libworld.a build/linux/world/world.o ranlib build/linux/world/libworld.a Install file: "build/linux/world/libworld.a" as "export/linux/lib/libworld.a" cc -o build/linux/hello/hello build/linux/hello/hello.o -Lexport/linux/lib -lworld Install file: "build/linux/hello/hello" as "export/linux/bin/hello"
